channel.description: Recent content in person search on Zijie Wang`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- Person Search] Weakly Supervised Sketch Based Person Search (ICMR 2021)
item.description: Weakly Supervised Sketch Based Person Search (ICMR 2021) 概述 弱监督 Sketch Based Person Search 任务，没有选框标注。 本文提出一种基于聚类与特征注意力的弱监督学习架构 (clustering and feature attention based weakly supervised learning framework, CFA)，并构建了 Sketch
